item.title: Why is Tamboli Industri falling/rising?
item.description: On 15 Dec, Tamboli Industries Ltd witnessed a decline in its share price, continuing a downward trend that has persisted over recent weeks and months, reflecting broader challenges faced by the stock relative to market benchmarks and sector peers. Time: 18 seconds ago

item.title: Why is Som Datt Finance falling/rising?
item.description: On 15-Dec, Som Datt Finance Corporation Ltd recorded a price increase of 1.08%, closing at ₹111.95, reflecting a continuation of recent positive momentum despite a challenging broader market context. Time: 20 seconds ago

item.title: Why is Seasons Textiles falling/rising?
item.description: On 15 Dec, Seasons Textiles Ltd witnessed a significant rise in its share price, closing at ₹20.49, up ₹1.49 or 7.84% from the previous close. This upward movement reflects a strong short-term momentum supported by robust trading activity and technical indicators. Time: 22 seconds ago

item.title: Why is Rasandik Engg. falling/rising?
item.description: On 15-Dec, Rasandik Engineering Industries India Ltd witnessed a significant decline in its share price, closing at Rs 60.18, down by Rs 3.66 or 5.73% from the previous close. This drop marks a fresh 52-week low for the stock and reflects a broader pattern of underperformance relative to market benchmarks and sector peers. Time: 23 seconds ago

item.title: Why is Sangal Papers falling/rising?
item.description: On 15 Dec, Sangal Papers Ltd witnessed a significant price increase of 13.66%, closing at ₹215.95. This sharp rise reflects a combination of strong technical momentum and heightened investor participation, setting the stock apart from broader market trends. Time: 23 seconds ago

item.title: JSW Energy Forms Death Cross, Signalling Potential Bearish Trend
item.description: JSW Energy, a prominent player in the power sector, has recently formed a Death Cross, a technical indicator where the 50-day moving average crosses below the 200-day moving average. This development often signals a shift towards a bearish trend and suggests a weakening momentum in the stock’s price over the longer term. Time: Dec 15 2025 06:20 PM IST
